description:
In commit 8da178d, the VPN management was removed from nova-manage.

AFAIK now the cloudpipe instances should be managed trough the API, so it should be implemented in python-novaclient.
title: Add VPN management on novaclient

comments.content:
In commit 8da178d, the VPN management was removed from nova-manage.

AFAIK now the cloudpipe instances should be managed trough the API, so it should be implemented in python-novaclient.
